name: The Transporter: The Special Delivery Edition (Widescreen)

reviews.name: The Transporter: The Special Delivery Edition (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText:
I bought this as a gift for my sister, a huge movie goer who just so happened to miss this one when it was out at theaters. I have seen this movie at least a dozen times.

I love love love this film. It is loaded with action, a great plot, fast cars, martial arts and one of my favorite actors. You will easily be addicted to the character and will purchase Tranporter 2.

You cant beat the price or the quality either. A great movie, for a great price, such a deal! Enjoy and get the popcorn ready!
reviews.title: A Must See film for high-impact action seekers!

reviews.name: The Transporter: The Special Delivery Edition (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: When I received my DVD's we played the first one and it was scratched. I threw away the package after I opened it so I couldn't return it.
reviews.title: Scratched

reviews.name: The Transporter: The Special Delivery Edition (Widescreen)
reviews.reviewText: This has the movie and deleted & extended scenes too. I just seen the actor in Cellular as a bad guy and it was hard to bear. I get this type of selection because of the extras!
reviews.title: A deal a DEAL
